message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product that I believe you'll really appreciate. I'm thinking of a price of $12000 for this product. Would you be interested?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I can meet you halfway at $10500, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Would you consider that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to make some concessions, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to come down to $11000, but that's as low as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $10200 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can come down to $10800, but that's as low as I can go. This is my final offer, so please let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I've already made a concession of $800 from my initial offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm afraid I'm going to have to draw a line at $11000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not willing to pay $11000. I'm willing to pay $10200 for the product. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options, including buying from John for $8000.
